thread.title: Facebook, Silicon Valley, 'like' Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi
thread.title_full: Facebook, Silicon Valley, 'like' Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Facebook, Silicon Valley, 'like' Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi
text:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Facebook founder and chief executive Mark Zuckerberg received a warm reception from a friendly crowd of about 1,000 at Facebook's Silicon Valley headquarters on Sunday. Modi also visited with Google CEO Sundar Pichai.
Â»
